text: Heroes of the Cross is a 1909 production by the Limelight Department of the The Salvation Army in Australia."Australia's First Film Studio" at Salvation Army Many items from the production were later mistaken as coming from the 1901 film, Soldiers of the Cross.Soldiers of the Cross at National Film and Sound Archive ==References== ==External links== * *Heroes of the Cross items at National Film and Sound Archive Category:Australian films Category:Australian silent films Category:1909 films Category:Australian black-and-white films Category:Limelight Department films
title: Heroes of the Cross
